snippet.title: Big Boss: A Villain Simulator | Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
This is the official teaser for Big Boss: A Villain Simulator. 

Big Boss is a comedic asymmetrical fighting game where parties of heroes are defeated by you, the player, as you fight your way to become THE Final Boss through ascending the corporate ladder of E.V.I.L.L.C. As a Boss, you are able to customize your lair, moveset, technique and strategy after each group of heroes are defeated. Big Boss merges a new way of fighting with RPG and Roguelike elements, as every hero that attempts to defeat you is randomly generated with different movesets and abilities. Are you ready to climb the corporate ladder and own the throne of evil?
